title: Canadian Journal of Occupational Therapy
aka: Canadian Journal of Occupational Therapy and Physiotherapy
additional-notes: This is a Canadian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This journal published under the title 'Canadian Journal of Occupational Therapy and Physiotherapy' from 1937 to 1939.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Joe Kishman for copyright research on this title.
